T02D3051:99a-0: @99a [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] [line missing] @99b [page missing] @100a * //
T02D3051:99a-3: h'um bcom ldan rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba ni //
T02D3051:99a-4: rig sngags bdag po phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3051:99a-5: snying rje'i yid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal //
T02D3051:99a-6: de nas byin brlabs gnang ba mdzad par gsol //
T02D3051:99a-7: dgongs shig sangs rgyas sde dang tshogs ;
T02D3051:99a-8: / lha rnams bstan la mngon dga' ba //
T02D3051:99a-9: dkyil 'khor byin brlab dngos grub mdzod //
T02D3051:99a-12: de nas gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i bum pa
T02D3051:99a-13: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la lha'i grangs dang mnyam
T02D3051:99a-14: pa'am / yang na gnyis la sna tshogs padma'i steng du rang gi mtshan nyid bri /
T02D3051:99a-15: las kyi bum pa la padma'i dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
T02D3051:99a-16: gtso bo'i bum par sman lnga /
T02D3051:99a-19: dri chu bdud rtsi lngas bkang la /
T02D3051:99a-20: bum pa gzhan du 'ang de bzhin te /
T02D3051:99a-21: mgul chings ras zung gcig gis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D3051:99a-22: me tog phreng ba dang gdugs kyis brgyan te /
T02D3051:99a-23: gdugs dkar po re re dbub par bya'o //
T02D3051:99a-24: tsu ta la sogs te 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing gis kha brgyan par bya'o //
T02D3051:99a-25: de nas gtso bo'i bum par padma'i sku bskyed /
T02D3051:99a-26: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas la /
T02D3051:99a-27: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs bstims la /
T02D3051:99a-28: mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya /
T02D3051:99a-29: dam tshig gi khro bo dang /
T02D3051:99a-30: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi gnyis 'dres pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
T02D3051:99a-31: de nas bum pa gzhan du yang shes par bya'o //
T02D3051:99a-32: las kyi bum pa la padma'i steng du las thams cad pa'i khro bo bskyed la /
T02D3051:99a-33: ye shes bcug la mchod pa dang bzlas ba byas nas /
T02D3051:99a-34: ma zhu bar skur bzhugs par bsgoms nas ma grub
T02D3051:99a-35: bar du bgegs ma rungs pa bsrung bar gsol ba
T02D3051:99a-36: gdab bo // bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3051:99a-37: de nas slob ma shar phyogs su mandal phul la der 'dug la /
T02D3051:99a-38: rdo rje slob dpon gyis gtso bo'i nga rgyal byas la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D3051:99a-39: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D3051:99a-40: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D3051:99a-41: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D3051:99a-42: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D3051:99a-43: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D3051:99a-44: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3051:99a-45: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te /
T02D3051:100b-0: skyabs @100b gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D3051:100b-1: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D3051:100b-4: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag pa nas bzung nas /
T02D3051:100b-5: bu tshur theg pa chen po la //
T02D3051:100b-6: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D3051:100b-7: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02D3051:100b-8: khyod la yang dag bstan par bgyi //
T02D3051:100b-9: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02D3051:100b-10: gang dag de bzhin ma byon dang //
T02D3051:100b-11: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D3051:100b-12: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams //
T02D3051:100b-13: de dag kun gyi sa gsang sngags kyi //
T02D3051:100b-14: tshogs mchog bzang po 'di mkhyen nas //
T02D3051:100b-15: dpa' bos byang chub shing drug du //
T02D3051:100b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes //
T02D3051:100b-17: gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pa //
T02D3051:100b-18: skyob pa rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba yis //
T02D3051:100b-19: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02D3051:100b-20: dpung chen dag kyang 'di yis bcom //
T02D3051:100b-21: de nas kun mkhyen thob pa'i phyir //
T02D3051:100b-22: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de nas nyan par rna ba gtod pa dang /
T02D3051:100b-23: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ste /
T02D3051:100b-24: de nas bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa dang thun mong gi sngom pa dang /
T02D3051:100b-25: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i phas pham pa bcu bzhi dang /
T02D3051:100b-26: sdom pa dbog pa la sogs pa dag kyang bya'o //
T02D3051:100b-27: de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum du dri'i thig le byas te /
T02D3051:100b-28: rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dag bskyed de /
T02D3051:100b-29: de dag gi lte bar sa bon gsum bsam zhing /
T02D3051:100b-30: aom a'a: h'um zhes gnas gsum du rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
T02D3051:100b-31: de nas mchod de so shing me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D3051:100b-32: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis btab la sbyin no //
T02D3051:100b-33: slob mas rtse 'cha' zhing rtsa ba brud la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dor ro //
T02D3051:100b-34: zhi ba la sogs te las dang dngos grub kyi rtags shes par bya'o //
T02D3051:100b-35: srung skud la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mdud pa bor te /
T02D3051:100b-36: dpung pa g-yon pa la gdags par bya'o //
T02D3051:100b-37: de nas ku sha la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis byin la /
T02D3051:100b-38: shar lho mtshams su mgo bstan la nyal te rmi lam dran par bya'o //
T02D3051:100b-39: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D3051:100b-40: de nas yol ba'i nang du log la mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3051:101a-0: de nas nang par dkyil 'khor gyi lha nam mkhar bteg la thig gdab par bya'o @101a * //
T02D3051:101a-1: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa so sor stong pa nyid las yi ge ldar gyur par bsam /
T02D3051:101a-2: de nas de dag gcig tu bsgril la /
T02D3051:101a-3: gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag la bdud rtsi lnga'am /
T02D3051:101a-4: spos chus bsangs te g-yas g-yon dbus dang gsum du aom a'a: h'um gis rim par bkod de bzhag /
T02D3051:101a-5: de ni dam tshig gi skud pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D3051:101a-6: de nas ma dun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i
T02D3051:101a-7: rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi skud pa
T02D3051:101a-9: rang gi mig gnyis su nyi ma bsams te /
T02D3051:101a-10: de'i steng du dza: dmar po bsam /
T02D3051:101a-11: de nas mig gi rdzim 'dren pas /
T02D3051:101a-12: ye shes kyi skud pa dza: sa drangs nas dam tshig gi skud pa la gzhug go //
T02D3051:101a-13: de nas mchod pa lngas mchod do //
T02D3051:101a-14: ye shes kyi skud pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D3051:101a-15: de nas slob dpon nub tu 'dug nas /
T02D3051:101a-16: skud pa rdo rje'i khu tshur g-yon pas bzung la /
T02D3051:101a-18: lte bar khu tshur bzhag la dza: gsum gyis slob ma'i lag tu g-yas pas drangs te byin la /
T02D3051:101a-19: tshangs pa'i thig dang po gdab bo //
T02D3051:101a-20: aom badzra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D3051:101a-21: zhes gyen du btab pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3051:101a-22: rnams 'gro ba'i don gyi dus la bab po bar
T02D3051:101a-23: bskul lo // de nas tshangs thig gnyis pa yang de bzhin du gdab par bya'o //
T02D3051:101a-24: de nas kha dog gcig pa'i skud pa las thams
T02D3051:101a-25: cad pas byin gyis brlabs la sa'i thig btab la
T02D3051:101a-26: / de'i steng du ye shes kyi thig btab la snga ma'i thig byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3051:101a-27: de nas ye shes kyi thig la mchod pa byas la slar gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3051:101a-28: de nas tshangs pa'i thig dang po btab la bya rog rjes gnyis lho byang du bri'o //
T02D3051:101a-29: de nas gnyis pa btab ste /
T02D3051:101a-30: des zur bzhi'i bya rjes btsal lo //
T02D3051:101a-35: de nas me rlung gi gru gdab /
T02D3051:101a-36: srin po dang dbang ldan gdab /
T02D3051:101a-37: de nas cha chen nyi shur btab na bde ba yin /
T02D3051:101a-38: de la dbus kyi pho brang dang sgo rta babs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3051:101a-39: rdo rje rab me ri gnyis bco brgyad ma gtogs phyi nas btsal ba thig gi rim pa'o //
T02D3051:101a-40: de nas tshon sna lnga'i rim par bzhag ste /
T02D3051:101a-41: stong pa nyid las yi ge lnga las bskyed de /
T02D3051:101a-42: dri dang bdud rtsis bsangs la /
T02D3051:101a-43: de nas snga ma bzhin du ye shes tshon 'bar
T02D3051:101b-0: @101b ba'i lta bas snga ma bzhin du bkug la
T02D3051:101b-1: bstim la / aom badzra tsi tras ma ya stvam zhes bzlas /
T02D3051:101b-2: de nas byang shar mtshams nas dkar po drangs te /
T02D3051:101b-3: mdzub gang bla ma'i lag pa g-yon pas bri'o //
T02D3051:101b-5: chos dbyings 'di ni dag pa ste //
T02D3051:101b-6: sems can khams kun sgrol byed pa //
T02D3051:101b-7: rgyal ba rdo rje ga nam lcags mchu 'bar nyid //
T02D3051:101b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D3051:101b-10: des mchod la rin po che'i snod kyis bkab la gzhag go //
T02D3051:101b-11: de nas dbus nas bri bar bya ste /
T02D3051:101b-12: rdo rje rtse lnga rgya gram rdo rje ra bar ldan pa /
T02D3051:101b-13: de ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yin //
T02D3051:101b-14: de nas phyi yi zlum po ni //
T02D3051:101b-15: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i lte ba bya //
T02D3051:101b-16: de yi phyi rim rdo rje'i rab bya //
T02D3051:101b-17: gru chad snam bu bzhi dang ldan //
T02D3051:101b-18: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D3051:101b-19: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D3051:101b-20: dril bu dang ni 'phan la sogs //
T02D3051:101b-21: me tog phreng ba rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D3051:101b-22: grva rnams dang ni sgo khyud du //
T02D3051:101b-23: rdo rje rin chen spras pa dang //
T02D3051:101b-24: de bzhin zla ba phyed pas brgyan //
T02D3051:101b-25: rdo rje'i phreng ba dang padma'i phreng ba bya'o //
T02D3051:101b-26: mtshan ma dgod pa yang rdo rje rgya gram gyi
T02D3051:101b-27: lte ba la rdo rje dril bu dgod par bya
T02D3051:101b-28: / shar gyi rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsa la ral gri bri /
T02D3051:101b-29: lho'i rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsa la seng ldeng gi phur bu /
T02D3051:101b-30: nub kyi rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsa la gnam lcags kyi tho ba /
T02D3051:101b-31: byad gi rdo rje'i rtsibs rtsal lcags kyu zhags pa dgod de /
T02D3051:101b-32: de dag ni nang gi phyag rgya dgod pa'o //
T02D3051:101b-33: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu dgod pa ni /
T02D3051:101b-34: khro bo bcu'i phyag mtshan dgod de rgyud gzhan dang mthun /
T02D3051:101b-35: 'khor lo'i grva bzhir nang gi lha mo bzhi'i phyag mtshan dgod /
T02D3051:101b-36: lha snam gyi gzhir phyi yi lha mo bzhi'i phyag mtshan dgod /
T02D3051:101b-37: sgo bzhir sgo srung bzhi'i phyag mtshan dgad de rgyud gzhan dang mthun /
T02D3051:101b-38: dkar po ser po dmar po dang //
T02D3051:101b-39: de bzhin du ni ljang dang sngo //
T02D3051:101b-40: sngon po nang du shes bya ste //
T02D3051:101b-41: 'di ni tshon gyi rim pa yin //
T02D3051:101b-42: shar phyogs su ni dkar po che //
T02D3051:101b-43: lho phyogs su ni ser po che //
T02D3051:101b-44: byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan //
T02D3051:101b-45: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni //
T02D3051:101b-46: nag po mig sman bcag dang mtshungs //
T02D3051:101b-47: 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor bri zhing phyag rgya dgod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D3051:101b-48: de nas bum ba dgod de /
T02D3051:101b-49: gtso bo'i bum pa dbus su dgod /
T02D3051:101b-50: las kyi bum pa byang shar mtshams su gzhag ste /
T02D3051:102a-1: bgegs bsrung ba gyis shig ces brjod nas /
T02D3051:102a-3: bum pa gzhan rnams ni dang po lha gang bsgoms pa'i phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D3051:102a-4: de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni /
T02D3051:102a-5: sgrub pa'i thabs su rgyas par bshad pas 'dir ma bris so //
T02D3051:102a-6: de nas mchod pa'i rdzas ni /
T02D3051:102a-7: me tog snod ni brgya 'am stong ngam bcu'o //
T02D3051:102a-8: bdug spos dang mar me dang dri chab dang /
T02D3051:102a-10: stong ngam bcu las nyung du mi rung ngo //
T02D3051:102a-11: aargham dang zhal bsil dang rol mo'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs pa dung dang /
T02D3051:102a-19: rnga rings la sogs pa yang 'byor tshad do //
T02D3051:102a-25: sprin chen po la sogs pa yang bri'o //
T02D3051:102a-26: slob ma'i grangs dang bstun pa'i gtor ma du 'byor ba dang /
T02D3051:102a-27: gzhan yang lha rnams la 'bul ba'i tshogs kyi rdzas dang /
T02D3051:102a-29: ras zung dang bcas pa mchod rdzas 'byor tshad pa yang gzhag go //
T02D3051:102a-30: mchod pa'i rdzas kyi rim pa'o //
T02D3051:102a-31: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor cha
T02D3051:102a-32: rkyen thams cad phun sum tshogs pa shes nas ni
T02D3051:102a-33: / de nas rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gu rus khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal byas te /
T02D3051:102a-34: me tog gi phreng ba sngon po blangs te h'um
T02D3051:102a-35: bzhi'i sngags zlos shing rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing
T02D3051:102a-37: bltas la phreng ba de bcom ldan 'das la phul la /
T02D3051:102a-38: yang gar bya ba'i tshul gyis rang gi mgo la bcings nas phyag bya'o //
T02D3051:102a-39: rang lha'i rnal 'byor du 'jug par bya ste /
T02D3051:102a-40: dang por khro bo gnod mdzes kyis bgegs bsal ba'i
T02D3051:102a-41: sbyor ba sngon du byas nas bla ma mchod pa
T02D3051:102a-43: ye shes kyi yan lag bsgoms nas /
T02D3051:102a-45: gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang /
T02D3051:102a-46: dam tshig bskyed la ye shes sbyan drangs shing bstims la /
T02D3051:102a-47: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba yan chan byas la /
T02D3051:102a-48: gtor mas 'byung po thams cad tshim par byas la /
T02D3051:102a-49: de nas sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas slob ma
T02D3051:102a-50: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis
T02D3051:102b-0: bsgom par bya'o // ye shes kyi dkyil @102b 'khor
T02D3051:102b-1: dang bsres nas bsang gtor dang mchod pa dang bdud
T02D3051:102b-3: ras zung thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3051:102b-5: de nas rang dbang blangs la /
T02D3051:102b-6: dkyil 'khor lha la dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D3051:102b-7: sems can don mdzod cig ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o ;
T02D3051:102b-9: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02D3051:102b-10: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D3051:102b-11: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D3051:102b-12: zhes rtse mo nas 'byung ba bzhin du gsol ba
T02D3051:102b-13: btab la dpal mchog dang bo nas 'byung ba'i glus
T02D3051:102b-14: nye bar bskul ba zhes bya ste /
T02D3051:102b-15: nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir//
T02D3051:102b-16: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa'i rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D3051:102b-17: rdo rje 'dzin par bdag sgrubs shig / dngos grub
T02D3051:102b-18: chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po
T02D3051:102b-19: lhag pa'i lha // rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D3051:102b-20: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag sgrubs shig / nyes pa med pa rtag pa ste //
T02D3051:102b-21: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su chags //
T02D3051:102b-22: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D3051:102b-23: bcom ldan de nyid bdag sgrubs shig / shin tu
T02D3051:102b-24: dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba
T02D3051:102b-25: de bzhin gshegs // kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D3051:102b-26: byang chub sems su bdag sgrubs shig / dngos grub
T02D3051:102b-27: chen po mchog gi mchog / dbang phyug chen po
T02D3051:102b-28: rgyal bas rgyal // grub pa'i rdo rje che gsal ba //
T02D3051:102b-29: rdo rje snyems par bdag sgrubs shig / sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02D3051:102b-30: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02D3051:102b-31: sems can kun gyi yab nyid de //
T02D3051:102b-32: 'dod chags mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /
T02D3051:102b-33: bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog / shes rab thabs kyi dkyil 'khor yin //
T02D3051:102b-34: bden pa de yis mgon bdag la //
T02D3051:102b-35: khyed kyi 'dod ba rab rdzogs mdzad //
T02D3051:102b-36: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D3051:102b-37: dag cing gsal la rnyog ba med //
T02D3051:102b-38: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D3051:102b-39: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D3051:102b-40: de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes //
T02D3051:102b-42: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02D3051:102b-43: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog / de nas bden pa bsgrag par bya ste /
T02D3051:102b-44: shes rab thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D3051:103b-1: lnga der bcug la slob ma'i mgo la bzhag la /
T02D3051:103b-2: aom ratna ku la mu dra aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes brjod de dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D3051:103b-3: de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid las pam las aa mi de bar bskyed /
T02D3051:103b-4: bkug la mchod de gyur pa las rdo rjer byas la sbyin no //
T02D3051:103b-5: aom badzra sa ma ya aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bas lag tu sbyin no //
T02D3051:103b-6: de nas dril bu stong pa nyid las don yod grub par bskyed pa dang /
T02D3051:103b-7: bkug la mchod de slar dril bur byas la /
T02D3051:103b-8: lag pa g-yon par dril bu gtad la /
T02D3051:103b-9: aom aa dhi ba ti aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bdag po'i dbang sbyin no //
T02D3051:103b-10: de nas rdor dril gnyis slob ma'i mgor bsnol te bzhag nas /
T02D3051:103b-11: ming gi dbang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin
T02D3051:103b-12: chos kyi rnam par snang ba'i bdag nyid sbyin par
T02D3051:103b-13: bya ste / aom badzra satva aa bhi shinyts'a mi
T02D3051:103b-14: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta zhes byin
T02D3051:103b-15: la kye dpal che ge mo zhes lha gang la
T02D3051:103b-16: me tog babs pa'i zhabs kyis mtshan pa'i ming gi
T02D3051:103b-17: bya ste / dbang bskur ro // 'di ni rig pa'i dbang lnga'o //
T02D3051:103b-18: rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02D3051:103b-19: bdag gzhan don ni rdzogs byed pa //
T02D3051:103b-20: rdo rje slob dpon dbang yin te //
T02D3051:103b-21: thugs rje'i bdag po stsal du gsol //
T02D3051:103b-22: zhes zhus pas de nas h'um las rdo rje sems
T02D3051:103b-23: dpa' bskyed la mchod de slar rdo rjer bskyed la
T02D3051:103b-24: / thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D3051:103b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D3051:103b-26: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D3051:103b-27: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag nyid bdag / phyag na rdo rje'i skyes bu'o //
T02D3051:103b-28: zhes brjod nas rdo rje sbyin no //
T02D3051:103b-29: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D3051:103b-30: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad//
T02D3051:103b-31: rtag par khyod kyis gzung ba yin //
T02D3051:103b-32: rgyal ba'i byang chub mchod par gyis //
T02D3051:103b-33: zhes dril bu g-yon par sbyin no //
T02D3051:103b-34: srid pa ngo bo nyid las dag / brjod la dkrol lo //
T02D3051:103b-35: de nas lhag par lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa sbyin te /
T02D3051:103b-36: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D3051:103b-37: sdug bsngal chen po zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D3051:103b-38: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D3051:103b-39: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02D3051:103b-40: ces brjod la gzhal yas khang dang lha'i rnam par dag pa bstan te /
T02D3051:103b-42: de nas rjes gnang sbyin pa ni //
T02D3051:103b-43: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa //
T02D3051:104b-0: sems can kun la phan pa'i @104b phyir ;
T02D3051:104b-1: / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D3051:104b-2: de bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D3051:104b-5: las kyi bar du bskur ro /
T02D3051:104b-6: de nas dngos grub kyi brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /
T02D3051:104b-7: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D3051:104b-8: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug / rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar gyis ;
T02D3051:104b-9: / phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D3051:104b-10: de nas slob ma sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i skur
T02D3051:104b-11: bskyed la bla gos kyi mtha' ma lag pa g-yon
T02D3051:104b-12: pas bzung ba'i khu tshur snying gar bzung la /
T02D3051:104b-13: g-yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la /
T02D3051:104b-15: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang//
T02D3051:104b-16: 'phags pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu //
T02D3051:104b-17: rdo rje 'dzin par lung bstan gyis //
T02D3051:104b-18: shes rab kyi lung bstan sbyin no //
T02D3051:104b-19: de nas gsang ba'i ye shes bslab pa ni //
T02D3051:104b-20: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02D3051:104b-21: khams gsum na yang sdig med do //
T02D3051:104b-22: de bas 'dod chags bral bar bya //
T02D3051:104b-23: khyod ni nam yang ma byed cing //
T02D3051:104b-24: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02D3051:104b-25: phyin chad shi ba yod min te //
T02D3051:104b-26: sdug bsngal bsris pas mya ngan 'das //
T02D3051:104b-27: srid pa gtan du dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D3051:104b-28: rang bdag yongs su bor nas ni //
T02D3051:104b-29: dka' thub sbyad par mi bya ste //
T02D3051:104b-30: ji ltar bde bar bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D3051:104b-31: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ;
T02D3051:104b-32: / de ltar slob dpon dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D3051:104b-33: sngags dang rgyud kyi phrin las can //
T02D3051:104b-34: sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems //
T02D3051:104b-35: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can don //
T02D3051:104b-36: khyed kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga dag / brtson par bri dang rgyud la ni //
T02D3051:104b-37: nyan dang bsgrub pa dag tu gyis //
T02D3051:104b-39: / dbang dag rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang /
T02D3051:104b-40: bla mal sgra sna tshogs dang /
T02D3051:104b-41: rol mo'i bye brag gis mchod nas bskor ba byas la /
T02D3051:104b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi snying gar bkod la /
T02D3051:104b-43: tshogs dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis tshim par bya'o //
T02D3051:104b-44: de nas yi ge brgya pa gdon //
T02D3051:104b-46: aom a'a: h'um mu: sa gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3051:104b-47: dkyil 'khor phyags la dman ma la sogs pa gtor
T02D3051:104b-48: ma dang rol mos chu po chen por dor ro
T02D3051:104b-49: // bdag gis dkyil 'khor cho ga legs spyar bas //
T02D3051:104b-50: bsgyur ba bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02D3051:105a-2: / dpal ldan gnas su 'gro bar shog / nor
T02D3051:105a-3: par gyur na mkhyen pa rnams la bzod par gsol
T02D3051:105a-4: / khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar
T02D3051:105a-5: ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /
T02D3051:105a-6: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po lho phyogs dpal
T02D3051:105a-7: gyi ri la bzhugs pa'i bla ma mee tri pas
T02D3051:105a-10: // / pandi ta bal po de ba purna ma ti dang /
T02D3051:105a-11: bod kyi lo ts'a ba mgar chos kyi bzang pos
